params.pids: Pool IDs of all to be updated. Make sure to update all active pools.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._pid: The index of the MasterChef pool. See `poolInfo`.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.pid: The index of the MasterChef pool. See `poolInfo`.

params._rewardPerSecond: The amount of token rewards to be distributed per second.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.pid: The index of the pool. See `poolInfo`.

returns.pool: Returns the pool that was updated.

totalAllocPoint.details: Total allocation points. Must be the sum of all allocation points in all pools.

add(uint256,uint256).notice: Add a new LP to the pool. Can only be called by the owner.

emergencyWithdraw(address,address).notice: Emergency withdraw total balance of this token

massUpdatePools(uint256[]).notice: Update reward variables for all pools. Be careful of gas spending!

pendingToken(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending Token

poolLength().notice: Returns the number of rewarded pools.

set(uint256,uint256).notice: Update the given pool's reward token allocation point and `IRewarder` contract. Can only be called by the owner.

setRewardPerSecond(uint256).notice: Sets the rewards per second to be distributed. Can only be called by the owner.

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool.

userInfo(uint256,address).notice: Info of each user that stakes LP tokens.
